Class: Game

Game(title, description, photo, textopt, textEntitiesopt, animationopt)

This object represents a game. Use BotFather to create and edit games, their short names will act as unique identifiers.

Constructor

new Game(title, description, photo, textopt, textEntitiesopt, animationopt)

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
title string
description string
photo Array.<PhotoSize>
text string | null <optional>
textEntities Array.<MessageEntity> | null <optional>
animation Animation | null <optional>
Source:
  • models/Game.js, line 11

Members

animation

Animation that will be displayed in the game message in chats. Upload via BotFather
Source:
  • models/Game.js, line 74

description

Description of the game
Source:
  • models/Game.js, line 42

photo

Photo that will be displayed in the game message in chats.
Source:
  • models/Game.js, line 50

text

Brief description of the game or high scores included in the game message. Can be automatically edited to include current high scores for the game when the bot calls setGameScore, or manually edited using editMessageText. 0-4096 characters.
Source:
  • models/Game.js, line 58

textEntities

Special entities that appear in text, such as usernames, URLs, bot commands, etc.
Source:
  • models/Game.js, line 66

title

Title of the game
Source:
  • models/Game.js, line 34
